page.title: 17LINDFIELD JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: LINDFIELD C. JUNIOR SCHOOL LINDFIELD JUNIOR SCHOOL WAS BUILT IN 1881 IN LEWES ROAD ON THE EDGE OF LINDFIELD COMMON.THERE ARE ABOUT TWO HUNDRED AND EIGHTY CHILDRE AGED BETWEEN SEVEN AND ELEVEN IN THE SCHOOL,DIVIDED INTO NINE CLASSES OF ABOUT THIRTY. AS WELL AS MATHEMATICS AND ENGLISH WE DO ACTIVITIES SUCH AS ART, CRAFT, GYMNASTICS, MUSIC,SCIENCE AND ENVIRONMENTAL STUDIES.WEHAVE OUR OWN OUTDOOR SWIMMING POOLAND THERE ARE CLUBS TO ATTEND AFTER SCHOOL ,SUCH AS CHESS,POTTERYAND MANY SPORTS. THE SCHOOL IS DIVIDED INTO 4 HOUSE TEAMS AND WE EARN HOUSE POINTS FOR GOOD WORK AND BEHAVIOUR.A HOUSE SHIELD IS AWARDED EVERY HALF TERM AND WE COMPETE FOR OUR TEAMS IN THE SCHOOL SPORTS HELD ONCE A YEAR. AS WELL AS T.V. AND VIDEO,THE SCHOOL HAS THREE COMPUTERS WHICH ARE SHARED BY CLASSES.
